SummaryEnglish: The series follows the adventures of a group of teenage Tamagotchi characters who live on the planet Tamagotchi. The characters attend school, work part-time jobs, and hang out with their friends.

1.TitleEnglish: My Virtual Pet / The Lost Pet
1.SummaryEnglish: Mametchi is disappointed when she doesn't get any virtual pet, especially when she learns that her best friends have got loads. / Memetchi loses Mametchi's beloved pet Bagubagutchi and refuses to look for him, leading to terrible arguments between the kids.

2.SummaryEnglish: Kutchipatchi teaches Mametchi and Memetchi how to do fitness, before introducing them to aromatherapy, crystals and a whole world of weirdness and danger. / Mamapatchi is arrested on a political protest. As everyone at school starts picking on her, Kutchipatchi turns to Mametchi and Memetchi for help.

3.SummaryEnglish: Kutchipatchi has started a eats-only diet, but it's giving her terrible wind. How long can Mametchi and Memetchi suffer without saying something? / Memetchi and Kutchipatchi are both auditioning for a soap commercial, but who will get the part? And how well will the loser take it?

4.SummaryEnglish: Mametchi is worried that she's not 'cool' enough so she tries to change her ways. Can she transform herself into the coolest girl in town? / The kids form a rock group in their quest for fame but soon find themselves arguing about which of them should write the group's songs.

5.SummaryEnglish: Mametchi's school has an exchange programme with a school in Japan. The kids are excited to discover who will be coming to stay with them. / Oh-no! Things are getting a little painful for the kids. Kutchipatchi is taken ill and Memetchi has an appointment with her super-scary dentist.

6.SummaryEnglish: The baby sets to start at 25 minutes making to Mametchi, Memetchi and Kutchipatchi and her toddler to finished. / The kids are queuing up for a gig at the town's main music venue. They imagine what sort of cute boys they might meet at the concert.

7.SummaryEnglish: A new local TV station is looking for presenters. The kids get hold of a video camera and set about filming their own programmes. / The kids are spending the night over at Kutchipatchi's house. Cue midnight chocolate binges, dearlie gossip and ill-advised makeovers.

8.SummaryEnglish: Mametchi's pet Bagubagutchi has fallen in love with girl dog Imotchi, but Imotchi doesn't want to know. Can the kids work their match-making magic on the two canines? / Mametchi's next-door neighbours Bunbuntchi and Hidatchi come to stay while their Otokitchi's in hospital. Mametchi tries to teach the boys to be more grown-up.

9.SummaryEnglish: Mametchi and Kutchipatchi become heroes and get their photos in the local paper. Memetchi is annoyed and sets about trying to become a superhero herself. / The kids have to write about their best qualities. Mametchi and Kutchipatchi end up doing Memetchi's essay, but what can they say about her that's nice?

10.SummaryEnglish: Kutchipatchi is going on a first date with a cute boy. Memetchi gives her coaching and advice, but how good a teacher is the self-styled Queen of Lurve? / Mametchi has lost her voice. Mischievous Memetchi uses the situation to set her up on a date with the ugliest boy in school. Special guest star: Hinotamatchi.

11.SummaryEnglish: Bagubagutchi has been bothering boy pets and there have been complaints. Mametchi and her tamafriends try to cure him of this behaviour, with mixed results. / Mametchi watches her to discover a huge spot on her wink. What can she do to get rid of it? Memetchi and Kutchipatchi have some suggestions.

12.TitleEnglish: Kutchipatchi and Androtchi / Run Rabbit Run
12.SummaryEnglish: A cute boy is staying in Kutchipatchi's house. Stan and Memetchi compete for his affections using increasingly desperate tactics. / Mametchi's little sister Chamametchi has just got an evil pet rabbit which is making her life hell. She enlists the kids to help her defend against it.

13.SummaryEnglish: Memetchi's rudeness has gone too far, and the whole town has turned against her. Kutchipatchi and Mametchi have to teach her how to be nice - and fast!

14.SummaryEnglish: Memetchi gets the other kids to join her in the new celebrity-endorsed Standing Diet. Is this the weirdest thing they've ever done? Sadly not... / Mametchi is moving to another town. Does this mean she'll never see Kutchipatchi or Memetchi ever again? Time for tearful goodbyes.

1.SummaryEnglish: Mametchi is now living in a new city with new best tamafriends Kuromametchi and Makiko. / Life is unfair when Kuromametchi's sister, Cizitchi, takes over,

2.SummaryEnglish: Makiko is playing too much video games and it's up to Mametchi and Kuromametchi to solve the problem. / It's a melancholy day in Mametchi's life. She is forced to watch a heartbreaking movie with her friends.

3.SummaryEnglish: Karumametchi is struggling to do her spellings. Mametchi and Makiko help out. / The kids are doing a sponge commerical, but they start arguing on who will be the narrator.

4.SummaryEnglish: The kids spend the day at Mametchi's aunt Yattatchi's, but things start to seem off as the she serves them yucky meals and forces them to go to bed at 6 in the evening. / Mametchi has a strange dream about climbing up a mountain and falling of in the process. But she better watch out. There are man-eating grizzly bears right behind her!

5.SummaryEnglish: The kids are having a trip to the beach, but it suddenly becomes rainy and the fun stops. / Makiko finds a handsome looking man named Hidatchi and she tries to fall in love with him.

6.SummaryEnglish: Mametchi's cooking class is preparing delicious meals for the principal, but will the kids succeed? / Mametchi's school has a new classmate named Minotchi, but she feels quite nervous on her first day. Mametchi and her tamafriends think of a plan to shake that feeling off.

7.SummaryEnglish: Mametchii's Spanish teacher, Mr. Candol, retires from his job. He is replaced by a lovely lady named Mrs. Arondly. / The kids go camping at Makiko's house, but the loud thunderstorm disturbs their sleep. Can they rest peacefully before time runs out?

8.SummaryEnglish: The kids of Trick-or-Treating at Halloween night, but the sweets that they get taste really awful! How can they make them yummy again? / Makiko gets a naughty pet rottweiler named Kuatchi for her birthday. She takes care of him, but he keeps chewing on her belongings. Can Mametchi and Kuromametchi solve the problem?
